attributes.action: help get Virgin Media in to County Durham!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: County Durham lacks cable technology, found in other parts of the North East and suffer from poor internet connections. In some areas, the cable stops on the county border, where councils can't decide who owns the bridge.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
